Handler

Class AudioHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler.AudioHandler

  • public class AudioHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The class responsible for playing all audio in the game. Plays files in separate threads. Utilizes third-party libraries (Javazoom.net) to play .mp3 files.
    Version:
    2013-02-28
    Author:
    Alexander Persson

        public void startPlaying(java.lang.String filename)
